Question.Subject: How can I look up who used to own a domain name?
Question.Content: Hi. Is there anyway to look up who used to own a domain name. eg. the domain has expired and is now available, but I want to find out who owned it a couple of years ago, before they let it expire. I know that domaintools.com will do it, but I'm looking for something free!
Question.ChosenAnswer: Looking it up on http://Archive.org might help - and Google indexes a fair amount of Whois data if you use a closed caption "www.domain name.TLD" search

Answer.Content: Looking it up on http://Archive.org might help - and Google indexes a fair amount of Whois data if you use a closed caption "www.domain name.TLD" search
